summary: Basic HTML/Javascript calculator to calculate magicka regen in and out of combat.
descriptionHtml:
This is a very basic HTML file designed to be opened within the Steam Browser that you can enter your Magicka Pool, Base Modifiers, and Magicka Regeneration and it will estimate your out of combat magicka regen, in combat magicka regen, and estimated time to full mana from empty in and out of combat.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS
  1. Extract file to an easy to find location, such as in your downloads folder
  2. Open the file in your regular internet browser (such as Internet Explorer, Firefox, or Chrome) and copy the url address (should start with \"file://\").
  3. Launch into Skyrim and bring up the Steam Webbrowser
  4. Type or paste the URL into the address bar to bring up the page.
  5. Enter the necessary information and the calculations should automatically happen.

NOTES
  This is still a work in progress, I am still working on figuring out all of the necessary variables to calculate Magicka regen, but have found it to be accurate for Magicka Regen calculations.  Base Modifiers still need to be identified.

RELEASE NOTES
  v0.1 - Initial Release of script.
author: Starhawkgamer
